"Phantom Reality":
"Hitsugi was isolated, disconnected from the
network. Mother Cluster's \"Apostle of Gold\",
Hagith Anie, approached. Hitsugi and Aru
were cornered. But then, hope descended
from the sky.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
